description: An organization such as a university, company or foundation.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp resource was last updated at

authorOfReport.description: Report that an organization is an author of.

items.description: ID of a report, an URI where the reports's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/report/guide

logo.description: URL to an image of the logo of the organization.

items.description: ID of a project, preferably an URI where the project's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/project/emetabolomics

involvedIn.description: Projects that the organization is involved in.

description.description: Organization description, in Markdown format underneath Frontmatter (---) in Markdown files

items.description: ID of a person, preferably an URI where the person's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/person/s.verhoeven
ID of a project, preferably an URI where the project's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/project/emetabolomics

ownerOf.description: Projects that the organization is the owner of.

id.description: ID of the organization. This is preferably an URI where the organization metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/organization/nlesc

items.description: ID of software, preferably an URI where the software's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/software/xenon

schema.description: Fixed property, to validate the JSON object with the current schema.
